data.title: Knowledge Graph Dataset
data.meta_description:
Hello everyone, 
I have started following the graph course. Where can I find the dataset that is used during the lecture? I mean the movies one. 
Many thanks.
data.text:
Hi,

The basic movie graph is available in the older “Neo4j Browser” as an example dataset. When using that UI, you can type :play movie-graph to display a guide that walks through creating the data.

For convenience, I’ll attach the complete Cypher script here, if it fits in a post.
